---

Week 3 is all about various types of statistical tests / models. We will examine for to carry out the following types of analyses:

- t-tests
- one-way ANOVAs
- pairwise comparisons
- two-way ANOVAs
- correlations
- linear regression models
- polynomial regression models
- categorical predictors in regression models
- ANCOVAs
- smoothers

The R script for this tutorial:

- [intro_to_r_week_3.r](https://www.dropbox.com/s/noyabp7crmz1rhh/intro_to_r_week_3.r?dl=1)

The dataset for this tutorial:

- [data_survey_edit.rdata](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ti8z282h15dyutx/data_survey_edit.rdata?dl=1)
